content:
Certainly, here is an updated allergen disclaimer to reflect the additional information:

"All of our products at Challah By The Bay are made in a kitchen that processes gluten, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, eggs, and chocolate chips. We take all possible precautions to avoid cross-contamination, but we cannot guarantee that our products are completely free from these allergens. If you have a severe allergy to any of these ingredients, we advise you not to consume our products."
